Text: HTS still in useI work in Applications Integration on the GEM Project Windows rollout It is our mission to ensure that all applications are tested and packaged for use with Windows so that the Enron user community can be migrated to Windows I am contacting you because we have identified the current version of HTS as not compatible with Windows and I found your name in the application group as one of the users of this application I need your help in gathering the following information Who is the owner of this application the person who can tell me if it is still needed Is it still used Has it been replaced by another application or a web based application If so when and which application If it is still used Vendor or developer name please include any contact info you may have web site contact phone number Who can work with me to obtain the new version if needed and test it Who uses it if this list is too large just note the approximate number of people Do you foresee that this application will go away in the next couple of months Is your maintenance contract uptodate Please contact me at your earliest convenience Thank you Howard Petty Applications Integration x

RE HTS still in useyou Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Thursday December AM To Petty Howard Subject Re HTS still in use I am no longer a user of this application Howard nronXgate AM To Audrey O CT Brad CT Chris CT Gerald CT James R CT Ken nron Lal CT Molly L CT James CT cc Subject HTS still in use Hello I work in Applications Integration on the GEM Project Windows rollout It is our mission to ensure that all applications are tested and packaged for use with Windows so that the Enron user community can be migrated to Windows I am contacting you because we have identified the current version of HTS as not compatible with Windows and I found your name in the application group as one of the users of this application I need your help in gathering the following information Who is the owner of this application the person who can tell me if it is still needed Is it still used Has it been replaced by another application or a web based application If so when and which application If it is still used Vendor or developer name please include any contact info you may have web site contact phone number Who can work with me to obtain the new version if needed and test it Who uses it if this list is too large just note the approximate number of people Do you foresee that this application will go away in the next couple of months Is your maintenance contract uptodate Please contact me at your earliest convenience Thank you Howard Petty Applications Integration x
